description: Sigma(x) = n has exactly five solutions.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a = Table[ 0, {5000} ]; Do[ s = DivisorSigma[ 1, n ]; If[ s < 5001, a[ [ s ] ]++ ], {n, 1, 5000} ]; Select[ Range[ 5000 ], a[ [ # ] ] == 5 & ]With[{upto=5000},Select[Union[Transpose[Select[Tally[DivisorSigma[ 1, Range[ upto]]],#[[2]]==5&]][[1]]],#<=upto&]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 27 2015 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 18 2001
